title: Will there be a toggle ON/OFF for the DJ Sona visor?
body:
Neon strike VI can shake her visor on and off
I hope you did this with the DJ Sona skin

replies.body: The skin team ad**visor** made a grave mistake!

> [{quoted}](name=CarBen,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7kA0XxQA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-02-04T03:20:47.372+0000)
>
> The skin team ad**visor** made a grave mistake!

{{champion:104}}

Alright, here's an Idea. Unique taunts for certain champions where Sona plays a remixed version of the target champion's login screen music.

It would be quite wonderful to see Sona taunting a Thresh by playing a wub wub version of his creepy ass nursery rhyme.

*Cling clang goes the **BASE***

because three hours worth of sound effects isn't enough.

not that I wouldn't love to see Sona remix Vi's and Lucian's themes.
Consider it compensation for cutting corners with her "voice".
Darn. GUESS I CAN'T BUY IT.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7kA0XxQA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-04T03:06:02.228+0000)
>
> No dice. D:

kinda disappointing in that regard, but non the less its still an amazing skin
My problem with the visor is that it makes her look like Lissandra, tis all

I am curious as to the decision for Concussive form to have a full helmet with the other two revealing their mouths? Idk, even though we only have two (atm technically) ultimate skins, I'm so use to seeing them "evolve". Make no mistake, I'm just IN LOVE with DJ Sona but thought that she would have some sort of evolving thing with her helmet at least :V  (I also really dig the design in C-DJ Sona. So edgy and different)

I hate to say, but i don't believe there will be. I think it's just how it is, they made 3 different versions so making another one for each without a visor would be a lot of work. But i dunno, we'll have to see.
